item.ashwake_quests_npcs.ashwake_wayston: A fragment of bound reality. It hums with a place that does not yet exist.

ashwake_quests_npcs.dialog.guidance.body: The ash remembers. Follow the ember path to the first shard. Return, and the next step will wake.
ashwake_quests_npcs.dialog.hint: Scroll or use Left/Right to turn pages. Esc to close.
ashwake_quests_npcs.dialog.hint_short: Scroll or Left/Right to turn pages.
